title: We Were Young (CRE106)
description:
A Classic RISK! episode from our first two years! In our sixth episode, Mike Daisey, Tom Shillue, Leslie Goshko, Brad Lawrence, Amy Dixon tell stories about things they’ll never do again.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Will Bernard, Trevor Jude Smith, the Elemental Wizard, Alec Gross, Amy Dixon, Brad Lawrence, Mike Daisey, Leslie Goshko, Kevin Allison, Tom Shillue)
